Coltrane Views¶

Here you can take a look at the views that built the Coltrane application. The views in this section will have define a Type attribute that can be one of the followings:

  • public, accessible to everyone
  • private or internal, accessible only if you are editing your own space
  • semi-public, accessible if the user has granted you permission

Views:¶

The following are the views from which this application builds upon:

coltrane.views.category_detail(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

This view returns a detail view of the category selected. The category is only shown. This view is used for people that want to get knowledge of a specific category.

Type:
  • public
Arguments:
  • request: Request object
  • username: string containing the username
  • space_name: string containing the space_name to which belongs this file
  • slug: string that contains the slug for the category
Template:
  • coltrane/category_detail.html
Decorators:
None
coltrane.views.category_list(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

This view returns a list of categories. These categories are only shown if the entry to which they belong are marked as live. This view is used for people that want to read about the user categories.

Type:
  • public
Arguments:
  • request: Request object
  • username: string containing the username
  • space_name: string containing the space_name to which belongs this file
Template:
  • coltrane/category_list.html
Decorators:
None
coltrane.views.main_area(request)¶

This view returns an area where you can look for people spaces

Type:
  • public
Arguments:
  • request: Request object
Template:
  • coltrane/main_area.html
Decorators:
None
coltrane.views.show_content_by_space_username(request, username, spacename)¶

This view returns a list of spaces for the specific username.

Type:
  • semi-public (requires permission of the user)
Arguments:
  • request: Request object
  • username: string containing the username
Template:
  • coltrane/content_archive_by_space_username.html
Decorators:
None
coltrane.views.show_entries_by_month(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

This view returns a list of entries by year and month. This list only shows entries that have been marked as ‘live’.

Type:
  • public
Arguments:
  • request: Request object
  • username: string containing the username
  • spacename: name of the space that you want to watch
  • year: integer for showing the entries in that year
  • month: integer for showing the entries in that month
Template:
  • coltrane/entry_archive_month.html (via object_list)
Decorators:
None
coltrane.views.show_entries_by_year(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

This view returns a list of entries by year. This list only shows entries that have been marked as ‘live’.

Type:
  • public
Arguments:
  • request: Request object
  • username: string containing the username
  • spacename: name of the space that you want to watch
  • year: integer for showing the entries in that year
Template:
  • coltrane/entry_archive_year.html (via object_list)
Decorators:
None
coltrane.views.show_entry_by_day(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

This view returns a list of entries by year, month and day. This list only shows entries that have been marked as ‘live’.

Type:
  • public
Arguments:
  • request: Request object
  • username: string containing the username
  • spacename: name of the space that you want to watch
  • year: integer for showing the entries in that year
  • month: integer for showing the entries in that month
  • day: integer for showing the entries in that day
Template:
  • coltrane/entry_archive_day.html (via object_list)
Decorators:
None
coltrane.views.show_entry_details(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

This view gives you the entry. This list only shows entries that have been marked as ‘live’.

Type:
  • public
Arguments:
  • request: Request object
  • username: string containing the username
  • spacename: name of the space that you want to watch
  • year: integer for showing the entries in that year
  • month: integer for showing the entries in that month
  • day: integer for showing the entries in that day
  • slug: string which is the slug of the entry
Template:
  • coltrane/entry_detail.html
Decorators:
None
coltrane.views.show_entry_index(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

This view returns to the index of the user space.

Type:
  • public
Arguments:
  • request: Request object
  • username: string containing the username
  • spacename: name of the space that you want to watch
Template:
  • coltrane/entry_archive.html (via object_list)
Decorators:
None
coltrane.views.show_link_by_day(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

This view gives you the links by year, month and day

Type:
  • public
Arguments:
  • request: Request object
  • username: string containing the username
  • spacename: name of the space that you want to watch
  • year: integer for showing the entries in that year
  • month: integer for showing the entries in that month
  • day: integer for showing the entries in that day
Template:
  • coltrane/link_archive_day.html
Decorators:
None
coltrane.views.show_link_details(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

This view gives you the link details.

Type:
  • public
Arguments:
  • request: Request object
  • username: string containing the username
  • spacename: name of the space that you want to watch
  • year: integer for showing the links in that year
  • month: integer for showing the links in that month
  • day: integer for showing the links in that day
  • slug: string which is the slug of the link
Template:
  • coltrane/link_detail.html
Decorators:
None
coltrane.views.show_link_index(request, username, spacename)¶

This view gives you the link index where you have all your links.

Type:
  • public
Arguments:
  • request: Request object
  • username: string containing the username
  • spacename: name of the space that you want to watch
Template:
  • coltrane/link_archive.html
Decorators:
None
coltrane.views.show_links_by_month(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

This view gives you links by year and month

Type:
  • public
Arguments:
  • request: Request object
  • username: string containing the username
  • spacename: name of the space that you want to watch
  • year: integer for showing the links in that year
  • month: integer for showing the links in that month
Template:
  • coltrane/link_archive_month.html
Decorators:
None
coltrane.views.show_links_by_year(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

This view gives you the links by year.

Type:
  • public
Arguments:
  • request: Request object
  • username: string containing the username
  • spacename: name of the space that you want to watch
  • year: integer for showing the links in that year
Template:
  • coltrane/link_archive_year.html
Decorators:
None
coltrane.views.show_spaces_by_username(request, username)¶

This view returns a list of spaces for the specific username.

Type:
  • public
Arguments:
  • request: Request object
  • username: string containing the username
Template:
  • coltrane/space_archive_by_username.html
Decorators:
None
coltrane.views.show_tag_index(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

This view gives you the tags index. The tags are separated for entries and links

Type:
  • public
Arguments:
  • request: Request object
  • username: string containing the username
  • spacename: name of the space that you want to watch
Template:
  • coltrane/tags_by_space.html
Decorators:
None
coltrane.views.show_tagged_links_object_list(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

This view gives you the links that have been marked with the tag

Type:
  • public
Arguments:
  • request: Request object
  • username: string containing the username
  • spacename: name of the space that you want to watch
  • tag: tag to consult
Template:
  • coltrane/entry_detail.html
Decorators:
None
coltrane.views.show_tagged_object_list(request, *args, **kwargs)¶

This view gives you the entries that have been marked with the tag

Type:
  • public
Arguments:
  • request: Request object
  • username: string containing the username
  • spacename: name of the space that you want to watch
  • tag: tag to consult
Template:
  • coltrane/entries_by_tag.html
Decorators:
None
